name: Domain Redirect
author: Vincent Pompe van Meerdervoort

sections.description:
Redirects users to specific URL based on the domain name they used to enter the website. My band’s name (Harmony Glen) ends with one N, while many people type it with two (Harmony Glenn). I registered that faulty domain and made sure that when someone entered the wrong name, they got redirected to the right domain and a page that explains how to spell the name correctly.

Perhaps this plugin is of some use for you. I intend to add the option to enter more domain names, currently it supports only one redirect.

Usage

Go to the settings page and enter the url you want to redirect to another url, including http:// or https://
Make sure you enter the exact URL you want to redirect!
sections.installation:
To install this plugin please use the “install” feature from the WordPress site, or upload and unzip to the plugin directory manually.

After installation you will find the Domain Redirect settings under the Settings menu.
sections.faq:
Who are you?

I’m a musician – check my band Harmony Glen and designer.

So you provide support?

Yes. If you ask me, I will try and answer as soon as I can. But keep in mind I’ve put this plugin up here just because I think it could be useful to others too. I am really busy so it might take some time for me to reply!
